message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a price of $14,000. I believe it offers significant value, even exceeding the price for its utility to you.  Let me know what you think.
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $12,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I understand your position, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?  I'm eager to find a solution that works for us both.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I am unable to meet you at $13,000. My maximum offer remains at $12,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
